data.description: Position Overview Tiffany & Co. is seeking a Software Development Intern to join our IT team. This internship provides hands-on experience with modern development tools, databases, and cloud technologies, while contributing to real-world projects that support our core business operations. You will collaborate with experienced developers and subject matter experts, gaining exposure to the full software development lifecycle. This position is based out of the Whippany, New Jersey office. The pay rate for this role is $25/hr. Key Accountabilities: - Develop, test, and maintain web and cloud applications using .NET(C#) technologies and Azure, while contributing to small projects and process improvements. - Work closely with developers, product managers, and subject matter experts in Agile meetings to understand requirements and deliver solutions - Participate in small projects and implement enhancements to improve business processes and efficiency. - Engage in knowledge-sharing s...
